poem:
Title: "The Dance of the Suits"

In the courtroom of shadows,
where fossil bones whisper and oil drums beat,
Suits strategize, with Leo at their feet.
Murmuring power, talking in billions,
while the Earth sighs, richer in resilience.
Justice weighs, in her silent scales,
a future crafted in boardrooms or gales,
The true verdict, time will assert,
will it be for the soil or for the dirt?
